CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, page 4, reads: "Valentine Greeting - Pittsburghers Francine Thomas, Clementine Scott, Ida Eliibe and Marie Hodges enjoy a homemade Valentine as only children can. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Four girls, left to right: Francine Thomas, Clementine Scott, Ida Eliibe, and Marie Hodges, holding large heart decoration, standing in interior with boy in doorway on left and bookshelf on right, possibly in Kay Boys Club
CatSubject_tab: Kay Boys' Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Books--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Chairs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Doorways--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Children--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Thomas, Francine.Scott, Clementine.Eliibe, Ida.Hodges, Marie.
